treatment.description: Inflorescences 10--30 cm; heads 20--30-flowered. Capsules exserted, valves separating at dehiscence. 2n = 40.
treatment.discussion: Juncus validus var. validus closely resembles J. polycephalus but differs in having complete septa, long-exserted capsules, and terete stems.
treatment.habitat: Moist to wet open sites, usually sandy, sometimes peaty, exposed or marshy shores of ponds, lakes, and streams, ditches, and fields
